page.title: 20Authors of work on Braintree
page.content:
This work was completed by a group of third year junior children from Great Bradfords County Junior School, Braintree, Essex.
Ian Twinn Jennifer Rainford Richard Cowan Suzanne Hardy Simon Cheale Louise Moore Stewart Dowman Louise Bloomfield Mark Willsher Nicola Thurston Matthew Foakes Louise Cocklin Richard Shwe Leanne Knott Nicholas Gatt Laura-Jayne Paul Robinson Shingles Nicky Britter Zoe Blake Christopher Ashton Julie Stevens Jay Grant Kayne Manning Nicholas Simpson
Thanks must also be given to Mrs. W. Phillips and Mr.J.D.S.Lord.
